quotes.quote: Patience is bitter, but its fruit is sweet.
quotes.speaker: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Patience is not simply the ability to waitâ€”it's how we behave while we're waiting.

quotes.quote: All things are difficult before they are easy.
quotes.speaker: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: It always seems impossible until it's done.
quotes.speaker: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: Little by little, a little becomes a lot.
quotes.speaker: African Proverb
